artist: Designer: Clemens-Tobias Lange; Photographer: Stephan Köhler; Book Binder: Thomas Zwang; Publisher: Edizioni CTL, Hamburg, Germany
description: two volumes bound with linen and red silk with iron spine housed in a wooden slipcase; bound volume with insertion of one loose folded page; lender's archive #211
dimension: 7-3/8 x 20 x 1-1/2 in. (height when volumes stacked)
medium: Photographs and red ink; letterpress; bound volumes (2)
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed by the photographer and the designer/printer in black ink on colophon page: Stephan Kohler │Clemens-Tobias Lange
title: Mexico: Catalino's Letters
